description:
The original compact xc travel profile. Securely holds classic and skate skis for waxing and base work.

  • Secure, stable 3 point support for all xc skis
  • Holds the binding - height-adjustable center locks any cross country ski with a binding (NNN®, SNS®, Turnamic®)
  • Profile supports pivot to fit the exact shape of any ski, or may be rotated 90° and locked to support 2 skis
  • Soft molded rubber pads are durable, non-marking and exceptionally non-slip
  • Mounts on any table with the 3 c-clamps provided
  • Compact design is readily portable for travel and easily fits in wax box
name: Tools4Boards Compact Cross Country Vise
